quest.name: Cat on a Cold Stone Roof
journal: The nonplussed noblewoman is looking up into the parapets with a panicked expression.
A noblewoman's beloved pet has gotten itself into quite a pickle. She has found her way up onto the roof and cannot get down. Help the poor thing get back down to the ground.
You rescue the kitten. It is suspiciously coeurl-like, but take it back to the noblewoman anywayâ”€she promised a reward!

The woman is overjoyed to have her pet back safe and sound. You try to inform her that it seems more like a coeurl pup than a cat, but she is thoroughly convinced that it is an adorable kitten. All you can do now is to pray for her safety.
objectives: Deliver the pet to the noblewoman.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The suspiciously coeurl-like kitten peers over the ledge apprehensively.

dialogue.name: LADY01754
dialogue.text: Oh, my baby! My poor, poor baby! How did you get up there!?

dialogue.name: LADY01754
dialogue.text: <sob> Oh, whatever shall I do? It's so high up... Please, somebody do something!

dialogue.name: LADY01754
dialogue.text: You'll help me, won't you!? Please! I promise you'll be repaid! Please save my poor kitty!

dialogue.name: LADY01754
dialogue.text: Please! Save my poor kitty! Please!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The suspiciously coeurl-like kitten pounces into your arms.

dialogue.name: LADY01754
dialogue.text: Do you have her? Do you have my dear, dear kitty?

dialogue.name: LADY01754
dialogue.text: There you are, you silly little thing. You had me so worried!

dialogue.name: LADY01754
dialogue.text: ...What? You think my dear little kitty isn't really a cat? She's really a coeurl!?

dialogue.name: LADY01754
dialogue.text: Hahahaha! To think I almost believed you for a second there! My dear little kitty isn't some man-eating monster. Just look at her! Look how cute she is!
